title: Implement automated daily task generation at midnight

requirements.text: Implement a backend timer system that triggers at 00:00:00 UTC daily to automatically generate AI tasks for all users

quotes: make the ai give tasks every day at 00:00:00

acceptanceCriteria: Timer triggers precisely at 00:00:00 UTC each day
AI task generation is invoked automatically without manual intervention
All active users receive new daily tasks at midnight

requirements.text: Ensure the daily task generation system handles timezone-independent execution and persists tasks immediately upon generation
acceptanceCriteria: Task generation occurs at a consistent UTC time regardless of user timezones
Generated tasks are immediately persisted to stable storage
System recovers gracefully if task generation fails for any user

requirements.text: Update the frontend DailyTasksSection component to automatically refresh and display newly generated tasks when they become available at midnight
acceptanceCriteria: Users see new daily tasks appear automatically at midnight without requiring a page refresh
Loading states are shown while tasks are being fetched
Previous day's tasks are properly cleared or archived when new tasks arrive

constraints: Use Motoko's Timer API for scheduling the daily task generation
Maintain single-actor architecture - all logic in backend/main.mo
Do not modify read-only frontend paths: useInternetIdentity.ts, useActor.ts, main.tsx, components/ui
nonGoals: Allowing users to customize the time when tasks are generated
